code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Button,notification}from"antd";import{CartIcon}from"./Icons";import{addCartItem}from"../actions/cartActions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AddToCart(){var _useSelector=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart;}),cartItems=_useSelector.cartItems;var _useSelector2=useSelector(function(state){return state.product.productDetail;}),product=_useSelector2.product,qty=_useSelector2.qty;var dispatch=useDispatch();var openNotification=function openNotification(){notification.open({message:'Shopping Notification',description:"".concat(qty," ").concat(qty>1?"pieces":"piece"," of ").concat(product.name," ").concat(qty>1?"have":"has"," been added to your cart."),onClick:function onClick(){console.log('Notification Clicked!');},placement:'bottomRight'});};var addToCart=function addToCart(){openNotification();dispatch(addCartItem(product,qty));};useEffect(function(){localStorage.setItem("cartItems",JSON.stringify(cartItems));},[cartItems]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{type:"primary",className:"btn-tocar",onClick:addToCart,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartIcon,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{marginLeft:12},children:"Add To Shopping Bag"})]});}
